oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of functionalized benzo-18-crown-6 compounds via the Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
KASHINATH, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: amino-acid derivatives
host-guest chemistry
crown-ethers
c-alpha,c-alpha-disubstituted glycines
bis(benzocrown ether)s
polyethers
complexes
chain
benzocrown ethers
suzuki-miyaura cross-coupling
boronic acids
palladium
macromolecules
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various functionalized 4'-and 4',5'-benzo-18-crown-6 compounds have been synthesized using the palladium-catalyzed Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction as a key step. Treatment of the bromobenzocrowns with various arylboronic acids in presence of palladium-catalyst and aqueous Na2CO3 gave the biphenyl-based benzocrowns in good yields.
